trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Naturally Psionic
trait.text: You are naturally psionic. You have a pool of two psi points. If you have psi points from another source, such as a class, add these two points to them; otherwise, you may only use these points to power your Githzerai Psionics feature.

trait.name: Githzerai Psionics
trait.text: You know the Mage Hand cantrip and can use innately with no components. The hand is invisible.

You can expend one psi point to cast shield, jump, or feather fall innately with no components, each with a range of Self. After using a psi point to cast one of these spells, you may not cast that spell again using this feature until you complete a long rest.
Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
These spells count as both magical and psionic effects,
You can also expend one psi point to cause your unarmed strikes to inflict psychic damage for 1 minute. This counts as a psionic effect.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak, read, and write Gith and Common.
